resources.string: How do you want to decide?

"Got a few ideas but undecided which to pick?
Let the app pick for you.

"
If you specified a decision type as default, the window will no longer show. This is where you can change it.
Permission to allow the developer to see what is used in the app. This makes it easier in future to know what extra features can be made depending upon features currently used.
If the app crashes, a crash report will be auto sent so the developer can diagnose what happened.
Are you sure you want to delete all options?\n\nTip: To remove one option, swipe the option you would like to remove
Simple decision maker for when you are stuck between different options
